content: > the ripple-lace v-neck top by christine l walter is a great easy crochet pullover pattern to modify the body of this vest is worked in double_crochet and the lace hem is crocheted using a larger hook size to emphasize the simple chevron peak-a-boo stitch try working this vest with a little negative ease **skill level ** intermediate **finished size ** 33 37 5 42 47 / 84 95 25 106 5 119 5 cm bust circumference garment shown measures 37 5 / 95 25cm top is intended to be close fitting with 0 2 / 0-5cm of ease gauge 20 sts = 5 and 5 row = 3 in peephole chevron patt with larger hook also available for sale 1 at interweave 1 https //www interweave com/store/ripple-lace-v-neck-top
